name: Author Box After Posts
author: pandasilk

sections.description:
Adds an author box after your post contents, with Gravatar and social profile links.
* More than 10 Social Profile supported
* Set custom avartar image instead of registering Gravartar account.
* Compatible with [WordPress SEO by Yoast] plugin.
* WordPress 3.9 Ready!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the full directory into your wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin at the plugin administration page
  3. That’s it!
sections.faq:
For more information,refer to For more information,refer to Author Box After Posts Document

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the full directory into your wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin at the plugin administration page
  3. That’s it!
